gurmukhi: ਸੁਭੰ ਰੂਪ ਸਿਅਾਮੰ || ਮਹਾ ਸੋਭ ਧਾਮੰ ||
transliteration: Soubhan Roop Siaamannd|| Mahaa Sobh Dhaamannd||
translation: His dark form looks elegant and is the abode of Great Glory.
On his face there are lovely delineations, which are superbly holy. 34.

gurmukhi: ਸਿਰੰ ਸੇਤ ਛਤ੍ਰੰ ਸੁ ਸੁਭ੍ਰੰ ਬਿਰਾਜੰ || ਲਖੇ ਛੈਲ ਛਾਯਾ ਕਰੇ ਤੇਜ ਲਾਜੰ ||
transliteration: Siran Set Chhatran Su Soubhran Biraajan|| Lakhe Chhail Chhaadaa Dare Tej Laajan||
translation: On his head there swings the beautiful, lustrous and white canopy, seeing whose shadow and considering it winsome, the light feels abashed.

gurmukhi: ਬਿਸਾਲਾਲ ਨੈਨੰ ਮਹਾਰਾਜ ਸੋਹੰ || ਢਿਗੰ ਅੰਸੁਮਾਲੰ ਹਸੰ ਕੋਟ ਕ੍ਰੋਹੰ ||੩੫||
transliteration: Bisaalaal Nainan Mahaaraaj Sohan|| Dhigadg Ansoumaalan Hasan Kot Krohan||35||
translation: The fleshy and red eyes of the God seem magnificent, before whose light millions of suns appear irritated. 35.

gurmukhi: ਕਹੂੰ ਰੂਪ ਧਾਰੇ ਮਹਾਰਾਜ ਸੋਹੰ || ਕਹੂੰ ਦੇਵ ਕੰਨਿਅਾਨ ਕੇ ਮਾਨ ਮੋਹੰ ||
transliteration: Kahoon Roop Dhdare Mahaaraaj Sohan|| Kahoon Dev Kanniaan Ke Maan Mohan||
translation: Somewhere He appears impressive in the semblance of a Great King, somewhere He allures the minds of apsaras or the daughters of gods.

gurmukhi: ਕਹੂੰ ਬੀਰ ਹ੍ਵੈ ਕੈ ਧਰੇ ਬਾਨ ਪਾਨੰ || ਕਹੂੰ ਭੂਪ ਹ੍ਵੈ ਕੈ ਬਜਾੲੇ ਨਿਸਾਨੰ ||੩੬||
transliteration: Kahoon Boor Hvai Kai Ddare Baan Paanan|| Kahoon Bhoop Hvai Kai Bajaae Nisaanan||36||
translation: Somewhere as a warrior He holds the bow in his hand, somewhere as a king he causes the resounding of his trumpets.36.

gurmukhi: ਧਨੁਰ ਬਾਨ ਧਾਰੇ || ਛਕੇ ਛੈਲ ਭਾਰੇ ||
transliteration: Dhanur Baan Dhdare|| Chhake Chhail Bhdare||
translation: He seems bedecked beautifully, wielding his bow and arrows.

gurmukhi: ਲੲੇ ਖੱਗ ਅੈਸੇ || ਮਹਾਂ ਬੀਰ ਜੈਸੇ ||੩੭||
transliteration: Lae Khagg Aise|| Mahaan Boor Jaise||37||
translation: He holds the sword like a great warrior. 37.

gurmukhi: ਜੁਰੇ ਜੰਗ ਜੋਰੰ || ਕਰੇ ਜੁੱਧ ਘੋਰੰ ||
transliteration: Jure Jan Joran|| Dare Juddh Ghoran||
translation: He is forcefully engaged in war, fighting frightening battles.
He is the treasure of mercy and ever kind.38.

gurmukhi: ਸਦਾ ੲੇਕ ਰੂਪੰ || ਸਭੈ ਲੋਕ ਭੂਪੰ ||
transliteration: Sadaa Ek Roopan|| Sabhai Lok Bhoopan||
translation: He is always the same (Kinds Lord) and the monarch of all.
He is Unconquerable and birthless and helps those who come under His refuge.39.
